content.prompt: An underlying cause of the Great Depression, which began in 1929, was

choices.label: excessive government control of business and industry
overproduction in the manufacturing and farm sectors
the budget deficit incurred after the First World War
withdrawal of foreign investments from the United States
the implementation of free-trade policies after the First World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
